metadata.title: CVE-2017-3083 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
Adobe Flash Player versions 25.0.0.171 and earlier have an exploitable useafter free vulnerability in the Primetime SDK functionality related to theprofile metadata of the media stream. Successful exploitation could lead toarbitrary code execution.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-3083` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

flashplugin-downloader - 26.0.0.126ubuntu0.16.04.1
flashplugin-installer - 26.0.0.126ubuntu0.16.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: flashplugin-nonfree package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '26.0.0.126ubuntu0.16.04.1').
